caption: Detection Finding
description: A Detection Finding describes detections or alerts generated by security products using correlation engines, detection engines or other methodologies. Note: if the product is a security control, the security_control profile should be applied and its attacks information should be duplicated into the finding_info object. The is_detection attribute of this class, also included in the profile, should be set to true even in absence of the profile.
name: detection_finding

evidences.description: Describes various evidence artifacts associated to the activity/activities that triggered a security detection.

is_detection.description: Indicates that the event is considered to be a detection or a security alert. Should be set to true.

resources.caption: Affected Resources
resources.description: Describes details about resources that were the target of the activity that triggered the finding.

vulnerabilities.description: Describes vulnerabilities reported in a Detection Finding.
